info.title: FortiOS Monitor
info.description: REST API for configuring FortiOS objects and settings

log--device--state--definitions--is_avai.title: Is Available
log--device--state--definitions--is_avai.description: True when log device can be enabled.

log--device--state--definitions--is_enab.title: Is Enabled
log--device--state--definitions--is_enab.description: True when logging is enabled for log device.

log--fortianalyzer--select--definitions-.title: Can Transmit
log--fortianalyzer--select--definitions-.description: True when system can transmit data to FortiAnalyzer.

log--fortianalyzer--select--definitions-.title: Can Receive
log--fortianalyzer--select--definitions-.description: True when system can receive data from FortiAnalyzer.

log--feature-set--select--definitions--s.title: FortiView Feature Support Information
log--feature-set--select--definitions--s.description: View type support information on whether the feature is supported and what filters it supports.

supported.title: Feature Supported
supported.description: True if feature of this view type is supported.

filters.title: Fortiview Supported Filters
filters.description: Filters supported for this view type. If undefined, there is no restriction on supported filters.

log--feature-set--select--definitions--d.title: Data and Graph Support Information
log--feature-set--select--definitions--d.description: Fortiview feature support on different on group data and graph data.

log--feature-set--select--definitions--l.title: FortiView Feature Log Source Support
log--feature-set--select--definitions--l.description: FortiView feature support by log source.

get.summary:
Return current used, free and total disk bytes.
Access Group: loggrp.data-access

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

get.summary:
Retrieve information on state of log devices.
Access Group: loggrp.data-access

schema.title: Log Device State
schema.description: Status of log devices for the system.

is_default.title: Is Default
is_default.description: True when memory log is available by default.

is_loggable.title: Is Loggable
is_loggable.description: True when disk can be logged.

num_ssds_available.title: Available SSD Count
num_ssds_available.description: Number of available solid state drives.

disabled_by_default.title: Disabled by Default
disabled_by_default.description: True when disk log is disabled by default.

is_fortiview_enabled.title: Is FortiView Enabled
is_fortiview_enabled.description: True when FortiView is enabled on disk.

fortiview_weekly_data.title: FortiView Weekly Data
fortiview_weekly_data.description: True when weekly FortiView data should be shown.

overrides_global_faz.title: Overrides Global FAZ
overrides_global_faz.description: True when global FortiAnalyzer is overridden.

ip.title: FortiAnalyzer IP
ip.description: IPv4 or IPv6 address of FortiAnalyzer.

overrides_global_faz_cloud.title: Overrides Global FortiAnalyzer Cloud
overrides_global_faz_cloud.description: True when global FortiAnalyzer Cloud is overridden.

excluded_categories.title: Excluded Categories
excluded_categories.description: Categories excluded from FortiAnalyzer Cloud logging.

is_faz_cloud.title: Is FortiAnalyzer Cloud Used
is_faz_cloud.description: True when FortiGate Cloud uses FortiAnalyzer Cloud for logging.

is_fortiview_supported.title: Is FortiView Supported
is_fortiview_supported.description: True when FortiView is supported on FortiGate from its disk or remote logging device.

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: Scope from which to retrieve log device state [vdom*|global].

get.summary:
Return FortiGate Cloud log status.
Access Group: loggrp.config

schema.title: FortiGate Cloud Log Status
schema.description: Retrieve the FortiGate Cloud log status.

expires.title: Account Expiration
expires.description: Unix timestamp of paid account expiration.

dlp.title: Download Leak Prevention
dlp.description: True when download leak prevention is used.

get.summary:
Return FortiAnalyzer/FortiManager log status.
Access Group: loggrp.config

analytics_configured.title: Analytics Configured
analytics_configured.description: Number of days analytics data is retained.

analytics_actual.title: Analytics Actual
analytics_actual.description: Number of days analytics data has been stored.

archive_configured.title: Archive Configured
archive_configured.description: Number of days files are retained.

archive_actual.title: Archive Actual
archive_actual.description: Number of days files have been stored.

mismatch.title: License Mismatch
mismatch.description: True when license model does not match FortiAnalyzer license.

exceeded.title: Device Exceeded
exceeded.description: True when number of devices exceeds FortiAnalyzer license.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: Scope from which to test the connectivity of the FortiAnalyzer address [vdom|global].

parameters.name: srcip
parameters.description: The IP to use to make the request to the FortiAnalyzer [<ip>|auto]. When set to "auto" it will use the FortiGate's routing table to determine the IP to make the request from.
